text: xallxhˌ tras wa nihæla khux wan thi kar phud khwam cring khxng phwk khea ca xanwy prayochn kæ brrda phu thi phud cring phwk khea ca di rab brrda swn swrrkh hela nan doythi phwk khea ca phanak xyu nı nan tlxd kal nı sphaph thi xallxhˌ thrng phx phrathay nı phwk khea læa phwk khea k phung phxcı nı phraxngkh nanhæla khux chaychna xan ying hıy
